text: Abdul Khalek is a Bangladeshi art director and production manager. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Art Direction for the film Agaman (1988). ==Selected films== * Bandi Theke Begum - 1975 * Nishan - 1977 * Alankar - 1978 * Notun Bou - 1983 * Nazma - 1983 * The Hunger - 1984 * Ranga Bhabi - 1989 * Mayer Doa - 1990 * Santona - 1991 * Golapi Ekhon Dhakai - 1994 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text-align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !!
